explanation:
In nim you declare a immutable variable whit `let`,the value of a let can be set at any time
but once is set it can't be changed anymore.
For the rest is the same as declaring a normal `var`
hint: Not only whe are trying to change an immutable variable,but also the second variable is wrong!
Not only whe are trying to change an immutable variable,but also the second variable is wrong!
